a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMalariaLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Malaria) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a malaria vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 4-dose schedule (The RTS,S/AS01 malaria vaccine should be used for the prevention of Plasmodium falciparum malaria in children living in regions with moderate to high malaria transmission, as defined by WHO) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMalariaLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient
Client is not due for malaria vaccination Case 1

a:t.value: Client is not due for malaria vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 5 months

def.name: Client is not due for malaria vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for malaria vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first malaria dose as client\'s age is less than 5 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.'
"Client is not due for malaria vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second malaria dose as the latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for malaria vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third malaria dose as the latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is not due for malaria vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client with fourth malaria dose as the latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the fourth dose.'

'Should vaccinate client with first malaria dose as no malaria doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'

"Client is due for malaria vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client with fourth malaria dose as the latest malaria dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
